info.name: Aragora API
info.description: Control plane for multi-agent deliberation across org knowledge and channels. Orchestrate 15+ AI models to debate your organization's knowledge and deliver defensible decisions with full audit trails.

request.description: Get system health status for load balancers and monitoring. Returns 200 when healthy, 503 when degraded.
Get detailed health status with component checks, observer metrics, memory stats
Get current state of the nomic self-improvement loop
Get nomic loop health with stall detection
Get recent nomic loop log lines
Get risk register entries from nomic loop execution
Get available operational modes (builtin + custom)
Get OpenAPI 3.0 schema for this API
Get list of all known agents with optional stats
Get agents ranked by ELO rating
Alternative endpoint for agent rankings
Pre-formatted leaderboard data for frontend display
Get instances where agent changed positions
Get significant moments for this agent
Get persona derived from debate performance
Compare two agents side-by-side
Get agents ranked by calibration score

query.description: Maximum number of debates to return
Filter debates created after this timestamp

request.description:
Get list of all debates for the authenticated user.

**Rate Limit:** 60 requests per minute (free), 300/min (pro), 1000/min (enterprise)

**Pagination:** Use `limit` and `offset` for pagination. Maximum 100 items per request.

**Filtering:** Results are filtered to debates owned by or shared with the authenticated user.

Start a new multi-agent debate on a given topic.

**Rate Limit:** 10 debates per day (free), 100/day (pro), unlimited (enterprise)

**Concurrent Limit:** 1 concurrent debate (free), 5 (pro), 20 (enterprise)

**Authentication:** Required. The debate will be owned by the authenticated user.

**WebSocket:** After creation, connect to the returned `websocket_url` to stream real-time debate progress.
Deprecated. Use POST /api/debates instead.
Get paginated message history for a debate
Check if debate has reached semantic convergence
Get grounded verdict with evidence citations
Check if debate reached an impasse
Create a counterfactual branch from a specific round
Generate audio/video broadcast of debate
Get debates formatted for dashboard display
Get metrics on agent disagreement patterns
Computationally expensive insight extraction (requires auth)
Find debates similar to a given topic
Get graph data for agent relationships
Retrieve memories from continuum store
Trigger memory consolidation across tiers
Remove expired memories
Get current trending debate topics
Get AI-suggested debate topic based on trends
Metrics in Prometheus format
Run formal verification on claims
Trigger a dependency vulnerability scan for a repository.
Fetch the most recent dependency scan result.
Fetch a specific scan result by scan ID.
List scan history for a repository.
List vulnerabilities from the latest scan.
Query advisories for a package and ecosystem.
Fetch CVE details from vulnerability databases.
Analyze code complexity and duplication for a repository.
Fetch the latest metrics report.
Fetch a metrics report by analysis ID.
List metrics analyses for a repository.
List complexity hotspots from the latest analysis.
List duplicate code blocks from the latest analysis.
Get metrics for a specific file (URL-encoded path).
List registered agents. Supports filtering by capability.
Register an agent with capabilities and model metadata.

Submit a task to the control plane scheduler.

Claim the next available task for an agent.
Get pending and running tasks for dashboard queue.
Get dashboard metrics derived from scheduler and registry stats.
Get scheduler and registry stats.
Get system health with agent health summaries.
Get health status for a specific agent.
Run or queue a deliberation (async when async=true).
Fetch a stored deliberation record by request ID.
Check deliberation status for polling.
List recent decision records (most recent first).
Submit a decision request for debate, workflow, or gauntlet routing.

Get decision status for polling.

query.description: Search in workflow name and description

request.description: Get list of workflows with optional filtering by category, tags, or search term.
Create a new workflow definition with steps and transitions.
Get detailed workflow definition by ID.
Update an existing workflow definition. Creates a new version.
Delete a workflow definition.
Start execution of a workflow with provided inputs.

Analyze content and determine its sensitivity classification level.

Get list of items approaching their retention expiration date.

query.description: URL to redirect after successful authentication (must be in allowlist)

request.description: Redirect user to Google OAuth consent screen for authentication. Supports optional account linking for already-authenticated users.

query.description: Error code if user denied consent

request.description: Handle the OAuth callback from Google after user consent. Exchanges authorization code for tokens and creates/links user account.

query.description: URL to redirect after successful authentication

request.description: Redirect user to GitHub OAuth consent screen for authentication.
Handle the OAuth callback from GitHub after user consent.
Link an OAuth provider account to the current authenticated user.
Remove OAuth provider link from the current user's account.
Get list of configured OAuth providers available for authentication.
Get list of OAuth providers linked to the current user's account.
Search and filter privacy audit log entries. SOC 2 Control: CC6.1
Generate a compliance report for a specified time period. SOC 2 Control: CC6.3
Verify the cryptographic integrity of audit log entries to detect tampering.
Get list of workspaces the authenticated user has access to.

Get detailed information about a specific workspace.
Delete a workspace and all associated data. Requires admin permissions.

query.description: Search templates by name or description

Get statistics for all cross-subsystem event subscribers including event counts, success/failure rates, circuit breaker status, and latency metrics.
Get a list of all registered cross-subsystem event subscribers with their subscribed event types and handler metadata.
Get status of the Arena-to-CrossSubscriber event bridge including connection state, event mappings, and throughput statistics.
Get cross-pollination metrics in Prometheus/OpenMetrics text format. Includes event counts, handler durations, and circuit breaker states.
Reset all cross-pollination statistics counters and circuit breaker states. Useful for testing and debugging.
Get circuit breaker state for a specific handler including failure count and cooldown.
Reset the circuit breaker for a specific handler, clearing failure count and closing circuit.
